newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 3,158 to the dollar for Aug 27 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 3,158 to the dollar for Aug 27 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,158 to the dollar for August 27.
This reference rate was set on Friday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Thursday for August 26 is also 3,158 to the dollar. It was 3,157 on Friday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
